name: Extreme Warehousing
description:
An entry into Deynum Studio's Completion Jam, 2020. 

A top-down shooter physics puzzle game, in the style of Smash TV meets Sokoban.

Gerald is a caretaker for a wholesome, caring global megacorporation. Specifically, he runs the warehouse. One day, he gets an email... and the rest is up to you!

If the web version runs poorly for you, please download the standalones provided. Please be advised that this is my first Construct 3 project, so the exports might be janky, buggy or in some fashion non-optimised.  If you're running the Windows, Mac or Linux versions, I'd really appreciate a comment letting me know how it runs! 

GRAPHICS ATTRIBUTIONS:

Taken from various free Kenney packs, available at kenney.nl
